title: Any progress in fixing the voice LTE call dropping problem with the Nov. 5, 2020 update?
content: Verizon confirmed that the Nov. 5, 2020 update caused a problem with my Pixel 3 XL disconnecting calls after 30 seconds when on voice LTE.  I set my phone to the CDMA mode and the phone works fine, but no HD voice.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
